text: isi tarah hum ne inhe jaga kar utha diya, ke aapas mein pooch gaj karle, ek kehne waale ne kaha ke kyo bhai tum kitni der tehre rahe? unhone jawaab diya ke ek din ya ek din se bhi kam, kehne lage ke tumhaare tehre rehne ka ba-qoobi ilm Allah taâ€™ala hee ko hai, ab to tum apne mein se kisi ko apni ye chaandi de kar shaher bhejo, wo qoob dekh bhaal le ke shaher ka kaun sa khaana pakiza tar hai, phir osi mein se tumhaare khaane ke liye le aaye, aur wo bahuth ehtiyaath aur narmi barte aur kisi ko tumhaari qabar na hone de
